description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=0/3. A fun new Quiz game - Can you impress the girl in to joining you under the mistletoe? 15 out of hundreds of possible questions are all that stand in between you and a first person view, virtual kiss with the girl of your dreams under the mistletoe! 3D version included in full game (you will need red/blue glasses to enjoy effect)
